title: Phase 3 Platform Readiness Assessment
description: Assess current state of CONSCIOUSNESS_PLATFORM against PHASE_3_SPEC.md. Identify what's built, what's missing, what's broken. Create actionable work orders for completion.
deliverables: List of blocked tasks with blockers identified
3-5 prioritized work orders for missing critical features
deliverables_completed: ✅ All 7 incomplete tasks documented with blockers
✅ 4 prioritized work orders created (WO-004 through WO-007)
✅ Deployment readiness checklist with 3 launch options

results.deployment_readiness: FREE BETA READY (needs engine), PAID MVP needs auth+payments
results.recommendations: Option A (Free Beta) = 2-3 days, Option B (Paid MVP) = 1-2 weeks, Option C (Full) = 3-4 weeks

acceptance_criteria: ✅ Report clearly shows Phase 3 progress (6/13 complete)
✅ Each incomplete task has identified blocker or can be started immediately
✅ Generated work orders are specific and actionable
✅ Deployment blockers identified (auth, payments for paid version)
notes: Assessment complete. Platform has strong technical foundation (46% complete). Core tools fully implemented. Missing user management and monetization features. 4 work orders created to address critical gaps.
